description: This is a Request for Proposal to acquire Butterfly Valves for use in the Maritime Defense Procurement Directorate at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. ## Notice of Proposed Procurement - VALVE, BUTTERFLY
### Solicitation Information
| **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | Numéro de sollicitation | W8482-242348/A | W8482-242348/A |
| Amendment Number | Numéro d'amendement | 6 | 6 |
| Amendment Date | Date d'amendement | 2024-01-18 | 2024-01-18 |
| Tender Closing Date | Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres | 2024-01-18T14:00:00 | 2024-01-18T14:00:00 |

The Department of National Defence is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of a valve, butterfly, as outlined below.

### Procurement Details
* Unspsc: 40141600 (Valves)
* Units of Issue: EA (Each)
* Delivery Locations: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia, and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-04-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-09-04

### Commercial Information
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Contact Information
* Jean-Pierre Normandin, Procurement Specialist
* Email: [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-3674
* Fax: None

### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the RFP and amendment, are available for download:
